topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ae5526368721bcb9c0000#post_546ae5526368721bcb9c0000
Passable is not the word I'd use to describe something with flubs that major.

There's just no good reason to use Nihon subs for any rider after W. (And from what I've heard from Magenta, Their Gaim is so bad that It's practically a different show.)

Also, Beautiful girl Kamen is actually supposed to be "The masked girl from Osaka".

topics.body: Nihon used OOO as an excuse to not translate certain animal names. (Over-time solved this issue by simply translating the animal names during the transformation sequences, Since we can hear what they're saying, It's not like the form names/songs don't make sense.)
